tool_description: A  API for your app which returns random motivational quotes. 10 quotes are added to the api each day
title: Motivation Quotes Api

api_list.name: Get A Motivation Quote
api_list.description: It returns a json with random motivation quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motivation-quotes-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/quotes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motivation-quotes-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
